actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution for primary expenses, 94th Congress, 1st session, for Committee on Science and Technology.

summary.text: States that effective from January 3, 1975, the expenses of the investigations, studies, and oversight responsibilities and functions to be conducted pursuant to rule X by the House Committee on Science and Technology, acting as a whole or by subcommittee, not to exceed $426,000 including expenditures for the employment of investigators, attorneys, individual consultants or organizations, and clerical, stenographic, and other assistants, shall be paid out of the contingent fund of the House. Provides that not to exceed $25,000 of the amount provided by this resolution may be used to procure temporary or intermittent services of individual consultants or organizations thereof.

titles.title: Resolution for primary expenses, 94th Congress, 1st session, for Committee on Science and Technology.
